text:
[Verse]
Feet on the sidewalk
Jump and spin around
Raindrops are falling
Splashing on the ground

[Verse 2]
City lights are glowing
Neon paints the night
We’re laughing in the rain
Everything’s all right

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Feel the rhythm flow
Let the stormy skies
Set our hearts aglow

[Verse 3]
Hands reaching upward
Catch a drop or two
Spinning in the downpour
Just me and you

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Feel the rhythm flow
Let the stormy skies
Set our hearts aglow

[Bridge]
Every step a story
Water in the air
Lost in this glory
No one else to care
title: Dancing in the Rain
